post.text: At Monday's debate, Trump denied saying a lot of the things he's said. Let's set the record straight.

comment.author: Joshua
comment.text: Super Hill Wins â€“ by Joshua Super Hill won The Hofstra debate She totally outwitted him Just played on Trump's hate Lester Holt was a wimp Letting Trump Troll on and on Hillary just rode the wave Calmly negating Don The Con She leapt over T-Rump Making many many bounds Thinking faster than a speeding bullet For us she totally astounds Trump just lied and rambled He couldn't match her iron will Trump The Twit lost To the amazing Super Hill http://www.politicalpoetics.com/hillary-super-woman/super-hill-wins/

replies.author: Vasiliy
replies.text: Really enjoy your poems Joshua . Keep 'em coming !!!

replies.author: Erin
replies.text: All Hillary has is Obama's old failed policies. #NeverHillary
